description: List the Amazon Redshift Advisor recommendations for one or multiple Amazon Redshift clusters in an Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: Recommendations
nested_items.description: The Advisor recommendations for action on the Amazon Redshift cluster.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier of the Advisor recommendation.

nested_items.name: ClusterIdentifier
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the cluster for which the recommendation is returned.

nested_items.name: NamespaceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Redshift cluster namespace ARN for which the recommendations is returned.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time (UTC) that the recommendation was created.

nested_items.name: RecommendationType
nested_items.description: The type of Advisor recommendation.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The title of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: Observation
nested_items.description: The description of what was observed about your cluster.

nested_items.name: ImpactRanking
nested_items.description: The scale of the impact that the Advisor recommendation has to the performance and cost of the cluster.

nested_items.name: RecommendationText
nested_items.description: The description of the recommendation.

nested_items.name: RecommendedActions
nested_items.description: List of Amazon Redshift recommended actions.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The specific instruction about the command.

nested_items.name: Database
nested_items.description: The database name to perform the action on. Only applicable if the type of command is SQL.

nested_items.name: Command
nested_items.description: The command to run.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of command.

nested_items.name: ReferenceLinks
nested_items.description: List of helpful links for more information about the Advisor recommendation.

nested_items.name: Text
nested_items.description: The hyperlink text that describes the link to more information.

nested_items.name: Link
nested_items.description: The URL address to find more information.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: A value that indicates the starting point for the next set of response records in a subsequent request. If a value is returned in a response, you can retrieve the next set of records by providing this returned marker value in the Marker parameter and retrying the command. If the Marker field is empty, all response records have been retrieved for the request.
